txt.en: 'Well, as you can see, the shaft just near me is utterly infested with those vile glow-worms. \n\n'Perhaps you can do me a good deed and smash the ugly crawlers, and while you are at it, collect some of the luminescent goop that gives them their eerie glow. I believe I can fashion some of that goo into a torch of sorts, which will light the way for me in this accursed dark.'

'Ah, lovely! Well...perhaps not lovely, but you know what I mean. I can smear this goop on anything, and it will provide a light for me as I wander in the dark. You have probably saved me from many a false step, [placeholder]!'
'Collect the luminous goo from those terrible glow-worms, if you would. I believe the vile stuff will be most useful to me.'
The mineshaft near Sori is utterly infested with glow-worms, the innards of which can be used to make torches of a sort.
Bring the luminous goop to Sori
Sori can be found in the southern passage of the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should return to Sori with the luminous goop you collected from the many glow-worms.
